save her younger sister Aria from her illness, Cassmire Crisis became a mercenary, wielding a sword and shedding blood to pay for her medicine. \n\nBut when Cassmire suffers a fall one day, memories of her past life as Aria’s wicked stepsister come flooding back. Rather than take up the role of villainess again, Cassmire vows to protect Aria this time. \n\nBut with Aria doomed by the story to face only hardships, Cassmire must pick up her weapon once more to become her sister’s loyal sword!\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B6%A9%EC%A7%81%ED%95%9C-%EA%B2%80%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%96%88%EB%8A%94%EB%8D%B0/3001), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59087644)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/cassmire-the-loyal-sword/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26287\u0026contentId=287\u0026platform=IA)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A6%B9%E5%A6%B9%E7%9A%84%E5%AE%88%E8%AD%B7%E5%8A%8D/326)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Cassmire-The-Loyal-Sword/568)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103982)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%84%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5/376)","es":"Un día, me caí y recordé mi vida pasada.\nEn realidad, es una novela de harem inverso donde mi hermana es el personaje principal, y yo era la hija del demonio de sangre loco, el Duque Chrysis.\nNo era mi intención involucrarme con el Duque Chrysis, pero la enfermedad de mi hermana se deterioró rápidamente y me vi obligada a visitarlo como su hija…\n—Mi hija no tiene que arrodillarse ante nadie. Incluso si este fuera el Emperador del Imperio, no necesitarías doblar las rodillas.\nEl Duque Chrysis, que no tenía sangre ni lágrimas, era un poco extraño.\n—Si lloras ante los ojos de mi hermana, solo morirás.\nMi hermana angelical, Aria, también se ennegreció por alguna razón.\n—Tú eres quien me salvó la vida, y eres el responsable. ¿Has olvidado la noche que pasaste conmigo?\n—Te he admirado durante mucho tiempo. ¿No puedes darme una parte de ti?\n—¿No quieres ser reina? Entonces serás el Rey. Seré tu marido.\n—La gente piensa que soy el Papa que sirve al Dios Sol, pero ¿sabes que tú eres Dios para mí?\nEran los peces de los caladeros de mi hermana.\n¿Estaba loco el mundo?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B6%A9%EC%A7%81%ED%95%9C-%EA%B2%80%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%96%88%EB%8A%94%EB%8D%B0/3001), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59087644)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/cassmire-the-loyal-sword/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26287\u0026contentId=287\u0026platform=IA)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A6%B9%E5%A6%B9%E7%9A%84%E5%AE%88%E8%AD%B7%E5%8A%8D/326)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Cassmire-The-Loyal-Sword/568)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103982)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%84%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5/376)","fr":"Née dans la pauvreté, Kashmir a dû prendre soin toute sa vie de sa petite sœur malade, Aria. Pour cela, elle est devenue mercenaire et a travaillé d'arrache-pied pour payer ses médicaments. Or, un jour, Kashmir est violemment tombée sur la tête et s'est remémorée sa vie passée. Elle était en réalité dans un roman d'harem inversé où sa sœur était l'héroïne, et elle, la fille d'un duc sans pitié. Ayant urgemment besoin d'aide pour soigner sa sœur, Kashmir dû rendre visite au père qu'elle ne voulait jamais rencontrer. De plus, l'intrigue du roman original ne cesse d'évoluer; sa gentille sœur, douce et attentionnée, devient impétueuse et les protagonistes masculins qui étaient supposés lui tourner autour comme des mouches, se sont énamourés de Kashmir! Quelles autres surprises attendent la grande épéiste Kashmir?\n\n---\nUn jour, je suis tombée et je me suis souvenue de ma vie passée. Il s’agit en fait d’un roman de harem inversé dont ma sœur est le personnage principal, et j’étais la fille du diable sanguinaire fou, le duc Chrysis. Je n’avais pas l’intention de m’engager avec le duc Chrysis, mais la maladie de ma soeur s’est rapidement détériorée et j’ai été obligée de lui rendre visite en tant que sa fille…\n\n«Ma fille n’a pas à s’agenouiller pour qui que ce soit. Même si c’était l’Empereur de l’Empire, tu n’aurais pas besoin de plier les genoux.»\n\nLe Duc Chrysis, qui n’avait ni sang, ni larmes, était un peu étrange.\n\n«Si tu pleures devant les yeux de ma sœur, tu ne pourras que mourir.»\n\nMa sœur Aria, qui ressemble à un ange, a aussi noirci pour une raison quelconque.\n\n«Tu es celle qui m’a sauvé la vie, et tu es responsable. As-tu oublié la nuit que tu as passée avec moi?»\n\n«Je t’admire depuis longtemps. Ne pouvez-vous pas me donner une partie de vous?»\n\n«Tu ne veux pas être la reine? Alors tu seras le Roi. Je serai ton mari.»\n\n«Les gens pensent que je suis le Pape qui sert le Dieu Soleil, mais sais-tu que ce Dieu est toi pour moi?»\n\nIls étaient les poissons des lieux de pêche de ma sœur. Le monde était-il fou?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B6%A9%EC%A7%81%ED%95%9C-%EA%B2%80%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%96%88%EB%8A%94%EB%8D%B0/3001), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59087644)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/cassmire-the-loyal-sword/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26287\u0026contentId=287\u0026platform=IA)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A6%B9%E5%A6%B9%E7%9A%84%E5%AE%88%E8%AD%B7%E5%8A%8D/326)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Cassmire-The-Loyal-Sword/568)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103982)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%84%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5/376)","id":"Cassmire menjadi prajurit bayaran yang tidak pernah melepas pedangnya demi adiknya, Aria yang sakit. Suatu hari, dia terjatuh dan membentur kepala sehingga dia mengingat kehidupan sebelumnya. Ternyata, dia berada dalam novel harem yang mana adiknya adalah pemeran utama dan dia adalah pemeran antagonis yang mengganggu adiknya. Cassmire tidak ingin Aria menjadi sengsara sehingga dia bersumpah untuk jadi pedang setia Aria agar Aria mendapatkan kehidupan yang lebih layak. Tetapi, rencana Cassmire bertolak belakang dengan apa yang terjadi. Semua pemeran utama laki-laki yang harusnya mengejar Aria, berujung mengejar Cassmire. \"Aku sudah gila atau dunia sudah gila?\"\n\n---\nDia menjadi tentara bayaran untuk mendapatkan uang untuk obat saudaranya yang sakit, dan dia tidak pernah mengambil pedangnya dari tangannya. Kemudian suatu hari, saya jatuh dan teringat kehidupan saya sebelumnya. Ini sebenarnya adalah novel harem terbalik di mana saudara laki-laki saya adalah karakter utama, dan bahwa saya adalah putri dari iblis penggila darah, Duke Christie. Aku tidak berniat untuk terlibat dengan Duke of Christie, tapi penyakit kakakku memburuk dengan cepat, dan aku tidak punya pilihan selain pergi ke Duke's... “Putri saya tidak perlu berlutut kepada siapa pun. Bahkan kaisar kekaisaran ini tidak akan pernah bisa menekuk lututmu lagi. ” Duke Chritie, yang tidak memiliki darah atau air mata, sedikit aneh. “Ketika air mata keluar dari mata Shu-Shu unnie, hanya ada kematian, anak-anak X.” Arya, yang seperti bidadari, juga menjadi hitam karena suatu alasan. “Kamu menyelamatkan hidupmu, jadi kamu harus bertanggung jawab. Apa kau lupa malam yang kau habiskan bersamaku?” “Aku mengagumimu sejak lama. Tidak bisakah kamu memberiku sebagian dari dirimu?\" “Kamu tidak ingin menjadi ratu? Maka Anda adalah raja. Aku bukan selir kerajaan. Bisakah koma menjadi kerajaan?” “Orang-orang mengira aku adalah paus yang memuja dewa matahari, tetapi tahukah kamu bahwa kamu sebenarnya adalah dewaku?” Ikan-ikan di tempat pemancingan saudara laki-laki saya juga datang kepada saya untuk bekerja Apakah dunia ini gila?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B6%A9%EC%A7%81%ED%95%9C-%EA%B2%80%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%96%88%EB%8A%94%EB%8D%B0/3001), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59087644)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/cassmire-the-loyal-sword/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26287\u0026contentId=287\u0026platform=IA)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A6%B9%E5%A6%B9%E7%9A%84%E5%AE%88%E8%AD%B7%E5%8A%8D/326)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Cassmire-The-Loyal-Sword/568)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103982)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%84%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5/376)","ko":"아픈 동생의 약값을 벌기 위해 용병이 되었고,\n검을 손에서 뗀 적이 없었다. 그러던 어느 날, 넘어져서 전생을 기억해 버렸으니.\n이곳은 사실 동생이 주인공인 역하렘 소설 속이고, 나는 피에 미친 악마, 크리시스 공작의 딸이었다는 것.\n\n크리시스 공작과 엮일 생각은 없었건만, 동생의 병이 급격히 악화되어 어쩔 수 없이 공작가로 찾아가게 되었는데…….\n\n“내 딸은 그 누구에게도 무릎 꿇을 필요 없다. 설령 이 제국의 황제라 할지라도, 네 무릎을 다시 굽히게 할 수 없을 것이다.”\n피도 눈물도 없다는 크리시스 공작이 조금 이상하다.\n“슈슈 언니 눈에서 눈물 나면 죽음뿐이다, X자식들아.”\n\n천사 같던 여동생 아리아도 왜인지 흑화를 했다.\n\n“그대가 살려준 목숨이니 그대가 책임을 져야지. 나와 함께 보낸 밤을 잊은 건가?”\n“아주 오랫동안 당신을 동경했습니다. 당신의 일부라도 내게 내어줄 수 없는 겁니까?”\n“왕후가 되기 싫어? 그럼 그대가 국왕 해. 내가 국왕 부군 하지. 혼수는 왕국이면 되나?”\n“사람들은 내가 태양신을 섬기는 교황이라고 생각하지만, 사실 내게 신은 당신이란 거 아나요?”\n\n동생 어장 속 물고기들도 내게 작업을 걸어온다.세상이 미친 걸까?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B6%A9%EC%A7%81%ED%95%9C-%EA%B2%80%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%96%88%EB%8A%94%EB%8D%B0/3001), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59087644)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/cassmire-the-loyal-sword/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26287\u0026contentId=287\u0026platform=IA)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A6%B9%E5%A6%B9%E7%9A%84%E5%AE%88%E8%AD%B7%E5%8A%8D/326)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Cassmire-The-Loyal-Sword/568)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103982)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%84%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5/376)","pt":"Um dia, eu caí e me lembrei da minha vida passada.\n\nNa verdade, é um romance de harém reverso onde minha irmã é a personagem principal, e eu era filha do demônio de sangue louco Duke Chrysis. Eu não queria me envolver com o duque Chrysis, mas a doença de minha irmã se deteriorou rapidamente e fui forçada a visitá-lo como sua filha…\n\n“Minha filha não precisa se ajoelhar para ninguém. Mesmo se este fosse o Imperador do Império, você não precisaria dobrar os joelhos.”\nO duque Chrysis, que não tinha sangue nem lágrimas, era um pouco estranho.\n\n“Se você chorar diante dos olhos da minha irmã, você só vai morrer.”\nMinha irmã angelical, Aria, também escureceu por algum motivo.\n\n“Você é o único que salvou minha vida, e você é o responsável. Você se esqueceu da noite que passou comigo?\n\n“Eu admiro você há muito tempo. Você não pode me dar uma parte de você?”\n\n“Você não quer ser rainha? Então você será o Rei. Eu serei seu marido.”\n\n“As pessoas pensam que eu sou o Papa que serve ao Deus Sol, mas você sabe que Deus é você para mim?”\nEram os peixes dos pesqueiros da minha irmã.\nO mundo estava louco?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B6%A9%EC%A7%81%ED%95%9C-%EA%B2%80%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%96%88%EB%8A%94%EB%8D%B0/3001), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59087644)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/cassmire-the-loyal-sword/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26287\u0026contentId=287\u0026platform=IA)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A6%B9%E5%A6%B9%E7%9A%84%E5%AE%88%E8%AD%B7%E5%8A%8D/326)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Cassmire-The-Loyal-Sword/568)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103982)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%84%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5/376)","ru":"Я стала наёмником, чтобы зарабатывать деньги на лекарства для больной сестры, и с тех пор не расставалась с мечом. Однажды я упала, сильно ударилась головой и вдруг вспомнила свою прошлую жизнь. \nЯ попала в роман с гаремом наоборот, где моя сестра была главной героиней, а я – дочерью кровавого безумца, герцога Криса. \nЯ не собиралась связываться с герцогом Крисом, но болезнь сестры стремительно прогрессировала, и мне больше ничего не оставалось. \n«Моей дочери не нужно ни перед кем становиться на колени. Даже император не посмеет заставить тебя склониться». \nСтранно, что герцог обошёлся без крови и никого не довёл до слёз. \n«Гибель ублюдков не идёт ни в какое сравнение со слезами сестры Шеше». \nАрья, которая была похожа на ангела, почему-то стала злобной. \n«Ты спасла мою жизнь, поэтому ты должна взять на себя ответственность. Разве забыла ту ночь, что провела со мной?» \n«Я давно восхищаюсь тобой. Ты не можешь обратить на меня хоть толику своего внимания?» \n«Не хочешь стать королевой? Тогда я буду королем. Королём и мужем. Хочешь короля в приданое?» \n«Люди думают, что я святой отец, служащий богу солнца. Но они не знают, что мои истинная богиня - это ты». \nРыбки из пруда младшей сестрички оказались в моих угодьях. \nМир сошел с ума?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B6%A9%EC%A7%81%ED%95%9C-%EA%B2%80%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%96%88%EB%8A%94%EB%8D%B0/3001), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59087644)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/cassmire-the-loyal-sword/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26287\u0026contentId=287\u0026platform=IA)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A6%B9%E5%A6%B9%E7%9A%84%E5%AE%88%E8%AD%B7%E5%8A%8D/326)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Cassmire-The-Loyal-Sword/568)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103982)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%84%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5/376)","uk":"Я стала найманцем, щоб заробити на ліки хворій сестрі. Меч ніколи не полишав моїх рук. Одного разу я впала та згадала минуле життя.\nНасправді це зворотній гарем з моєю мололдшою сестрою в якості головної героїні!\nЯ кровожерливий диявол, донька герцога Кріссі. У мене не було намірів зв'язуватися з герцогом, але хвороба моєї сестри погіршилась і мені довелося звернутися до нього.\n\n-Моя донька не мусить ні перед ким ставати на коліна. Навіть якщо він імператор, ти не вклонишся.\nГерцог Кірсі не мав ні крихти жалю і людяності! Це дивно.\n-Якщо ти заплачеш - тебе очікує сммерть, неправильна дитино.\n\nМоя сестра Ар'я, схожа на янгола, теж чомусь згнітилася.\n\n-Ти врятувала це життя, тож повинна взяти на себе відповідальність. Ти забула ніч яку провела зі мною?\n\n-Я дуже довго сумував за тобою. Хіба не можеш ти стати частиною мене?\n\n-Хіба не хочеш ти стати королевою? Я тебе короную. Твоїм чоловіком стане правитель. І все королівство отримаєш в якості приданого?\n\n-Люди вважають що я верховний жрець, прихильник Бога Сонця, але чи знаєш ти, що лише ти мій Бог?\n\nЩе одна проблема - моя сестра стала об'ктом цікавості багатьох чоловіків.\n\nСвіт зійшов зглузду?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B6%A9%EC%A7%81%ED%95%9C-%EA%B2%80%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%96%88%EB%8A%94%EB%8D%B0/3001), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59087644)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/cassmire-the-loyal-sword/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26287\u0026contentId=287\u0026platform=IA)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A6%B9%E5%A6%B9%E7%9A%84%E5%AE%88%E8%AD%B7%E5%8A%8D/326)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Cassmire-The-Loyal-Sword/568)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103982)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%84%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5/376)","vi":"Một ngày nọ, tôi ngã xuống và nhớ lại kiếp trước của mình.\n\nNó thực sự là một cuốn tiểu thuyết hậu cung ngược trong đó chị gái tôi là nhân vật chính, còn tôi là con gái của Công tước Chrysis, quỷ máu điên. Tôi không có ý định dính líu đến Công tước Chrysis, nhưng bệnh tình của chị tôi xấu đi nhanh chóng và tôi buộc phải đến thăm anh ấy với tư cách là con gái của anh ấy…\n\n“Con gái tôi không cần phải quỳ gối trước bất kỳ ai. Ngay cả khi đây là Hoàng đế của Đế quốc, bạn sẽ không cần phải khuỵu gối.\"\nCông tước Chrysis, người không có máu, không có nước mắt, hơi kỳ lạ.\n\n\"Nếu bạn khóc trước mắt em gái tôi, bạn sẽ chỉ có chết.\"\nEm gái như thiên thần của tôi, Aria, cũng bị đen đi vì một lý do nào đó.\n\n“Bạn là người đã cứu mạng tôi và bạn phải chịu trách nhiệm. Anh đã quên cái đêm bên em rồi sao?”\n\n“Tôi đã ngưỡng mộ bạn từ rất lâu rồi. Bạn có thể cho tôi một phần của bạn không?”\n\n“Bạn không muốn trở thành Nữ hoàng? Sau đó, bạn sẽ là Vua. Tôi sẽ là chồng của bạn.\"\n\n“Mọi người nghĩ rằng tôi là Giáo hoàng, người phục vụ Thần Mặt trời, nhưng bạn có biết rằng đối với tôi Chúa là bạn không?”\nChúng là những con cá ở ngư trường của chị tôi.\nThế giới có điên không?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** 劍也從未從我手中掉落過。\n\n然而在某一天，我摔倒後，回想起了前世的記憶。\n\n這裡其實是以我妹妹為女主人公的逆后宮小說中的世界， 而我是浴血而狂的惡魔，克里西斯公爵的女兒。\n\n雖然我沒有和克里西斯公爵扯上關係的打算， 但妹妹的病情急速惡化，無路可走的我只能找去了公爵家……\n\n“我的女兒不必向任何人屈膝，即便是這個帝國的皇帝，也不能讓你跪下。” 據說是無情冷血的克里西斯公爵有點奇怪。\n\n“你們要是惹修修姐姐流淚就給我去死吧，臭SB們。” 像天使一樣的妹妹阿利雅也不知道為何黑化了。\n\n“你救下的命你要負責。你忘記和我度過的那一晚了嗎？” “我一直都很憧憬你。你不能交給我你的一部分嗎？”\n\n“不想成為皇后？那你當國王吧，我當國王的夫君。嫁妝就送上整個王國可以嗎？” “雖然大家都認為我是侍奉太陽神的教皇，但你知道嗎？其實你才是我的神。”\n\n妹妹漁場裡養的魚也都闖入我的工作中，這世界是出毛病了嗎？\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** 9e03b2ca-5191-44a6-88b6-c0cd49d06b51:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"9e03b2ca-5191-44a6-88b6-c0cd49d06b51","title":{"en":"I Sold My Life for 10,000 Yen per Year."},"altTitles":[{"tr":"Üç Günlük Mutluluk"},{"ko":"3일간의 행복"},{"id":"Aku Menjual Masa Hidupku Seharga 10.000 Yen Per Tahun."},{"pt-br":"Eu vendi minha vida por dez mil ienes por ano."},{"tr":"Hayatımı yılda 10.000 Yen'e sattım."},{"en":"I Sold My Life for Ten Thousand Yen per Year."},{"en":"I Sold Off My Lifespan, For 10,000 Yen A Year."},{"ja-ro":"Mikkakan no Koufuku"},{"id":"senege mek telung dino"},{"en":"Three Days of Happiness"},{"es-la":"Tres Dias de Felicidad"},{"pl":"Sprzedałem swoje życie za 10000 jenów rocznie"},{"uk":"Три Дні Щастя"},{"uk":"Я продав своє життя по 10000 єн за рік"},{"ru":"Я распродал свою жизнь по 10000 иен за год"},{"ja":"寿命を買い取ってもらった。一年につき、一万円で。"},{"zh":"我用一年一万日元卖掉寿命"},{"zh-hk":"我用一年一萬日元賣掉壽命"},{"ko":"수명을 팔았다. 1년당, 1만엔에"},{"fr":"Le prix du reste de ma vie"},{"ja-ro":"Jumyou wo Kaitotte Moratta. This is a story dealing with the ensuing consequences.","pt-br":"\"Eu vendi minha vida por 10 mil yene o ano\" é um mangá baseado no romance \"Três dias de felicidade\" de Miyaki Sugaru, e conta a história de Kusunoki, um jovem com poucas espectativas para o futuro, que com 20 anos chegou ao fundo do poço. Foi forçado a vender até mesmo seus CDs e livros para conseguir dinheiro, nesse dia ele descobre uma loja que compra o tempo de vida, o tempo e a saúde das pessoas.\n\nEssa é uma história do valor de uma vida, e das consequências de vendê-la.","ru":"Парень, у которого туго с деньгами, узнает про магазин, где можно продать время жизни. 9eb78304-0436-484d-9a79-a925b45e2731:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"9eb78304-0436-484d-9a79-a925b45e2731","title":{"en":"Wind Breaker"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Windbreaker"},{"en":"Wind Breaker (Nii Satoru)"},{"ru":"Ветролом"},{"ja":"ウィンドブレイカー"},{"fr":"Wind Breaker"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["pt-br","ru","fr","en","vi","es-la","id","fa"],"description":{"en":"Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!","fr":"Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...\n\nMaison d'édition FR : Pika","ja":"彼らは、最強の不良軍団。そして、街の英雄───。偏差値は最底辺、喧嘩は最強。超不良校として名高い学校・風鈴（ふうりん）高校。この春、そんな風鈴のトップを目指して街にやってきた風鈴高校１年生・桜遥（さくらはるか）は、風鈴高校が“防風鈴（ボウフウリン）”と名付けられた街を守る集団となっていたことを知る。そして桜は、風鈴の一員として街を守るため戦い始めることに──！　不良高校生・桜の喧嘩英雄伝説、開幕!!","pt-br":"A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5611024), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=758150)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/action/teenage-mercenary/list?title_no=2677)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/shaonianyongbing/list?title_no=1575)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/mercenary-soldier/list?title_no=2416)\n* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/action/high-school-mercenary/list?title_no=2678)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/teenage-mercenary/list?title_no=3732)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/high-school-soldier/list?title_no=2367)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001139)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/teenage-mercenary/list?title_no=3252)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/high-school-soldier/list?title_no=2438)","fr":"Ijin est un jeune mercenaire qui est le seul survivant d’un accident d’avion survenu dans son enfance. Aber als der Anführer der vierten Generation beschuldigt wird, mit dem Feind gemeinsame Sache zu machen, ist er gezwungen, die Sekte aufzulösen und sich selbst umzubringen, um seinen Sohn Moowon zu beschützen. Ohne verbliebene Familie oder Verbündete lebt Moowon ein trostloses Leben unter ständiger Beobachtung ... bis ein plötzlicher Angriff der Stillen Nacht ihm die Gelegenheit gibt, in die Berge zu fliehen. Dort trainiert der junge Krieger, um die Kampftechniken seiner Vorfahren zu meistern, bevor das mysteriöse Verschwinden einer geliebten Person in zwingt, zurückzukehren. Folge Moowon auf seiner Reise, um den Tod seines Vaters zu rächen und die Bösewichte zu vernichten, die die Welt in Dunkelheit stürzen wollen!\n\n---\n- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A1DyXT9AZt8)\n\n- [Original Webtoon \u003cWebtoon kakao\u003e](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B6%81%EA%B2%80%EC%A0%84%EA%B8%B0/2362)\n---\n- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/47964)\n\n- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/legend-of-northern-blade-fr)\n\n- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/legend-of-northern-blade-de)\n---\n- [Original Book \u003cAladin\u003e](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=266454987)\n- [Original Book \u003cYes24\u003e](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/97912943)","en":"When the world was plunged into darkness by the ‘Silent Night’, Martial Artists from all over the place gathered to form the ‘Northern Heavenly Sect’. However, as time passed the martial artists from the mainlands began to conspire against the ‘Northern Heavenly Sect’, and eventually caused the death of the Fourth Generation Sect Leader, Jin Kwan-Ho, destroying the sect with it. As everyone left the sect, Jin Kwan-Ho’s only son, Jin Mu-Won was left behind. Mu-Won has never learned anything about martial arts, but he eventually finds the Martial Techniques secretly left behind by his father and begins to acquire the martial arts of the Northern Heavenly Sect. Laissé seul, sans famille ni alliés, Moowon vit une vie morose, sous haute surveillance... jusqu'au moment où une attaque surprise de la Nuit Silencieuse lui donne une chance de s'échapper dans les montagnes. Là-bas, le jeune guerrier s'entraîne afin de maîtriser les techniques de combat de ses prédecesseurs, jusqu'à ce que la mort d'un être cher le ramène sur ses anciennes terres. Suivez l'histoire de Moowon, dans sa quête d'héroisme et de vengeance, tandis qu'il se bat pour éliminer ceux qui ont trahi son père, et les démons menaçant de plonger le monde dans l'obscurité 9eff6d50-5ca7-4638-abcb-659fd51823b5:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"9eff6d50-5ca7-4638-abcb-659fd51823b5","title":{"en":"Yuujin Character wa Taihen desu ka?"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"友人キャラは大変ですか?"},{"en":"Is It Tough Being a Friend?"}],"lastChapter":"33","availableTranslatedLanguages":["es-la","en","id","fr","pt-br"],"description":{"en":"My first impression of Ryuuga was “This is the kind of protagonist you’d see in something like an anime.” Then, that thought soon changed into conviction. First of all, this guy almost never talks about his past. Also, he frequently slips out of class. As soon as he comes back, he gets extremely tired, blood comes out from his lips, the sleeves and cuffs of his uniform get torn, and so forth. Furthermore, there’s always beauties that are surrounding Ryuuga. The one who’s like an idol within the school, Yukimiya Shiori. The cool expert of the sword, Aogasaki Rei. The mysterious transfer student, Elmira McCartney. It’s very tiring for me when these people appear in front of Ryuuga. I have to frantically make a fuss by saying things like “H, hey Ryuga! How did you get acquainted with Yukimiya!”, “W, why did the beautiful swordswoman Aogasaki come to the classroom to specifically meet Ryuga?!”, or “E, E, Elmira! What is it that you see in Ryuga!” …So why am I doing this? That’s because I, Kobayashi Ichirou, am a pro at being a friend. My life’s calling is to support Hinomori Ryuuga, the protagonist amongst protagonists, as a close friend character. ―Let the curtains open for the rom-com presented by co-starring best friend, Kobayashi Ichirou! Based from a popular LN now in Manga form!","ja":"主人公の活躍を彩る親友キャラこそ俺の生き様――最強〝助演〟コメディ！","pt":"Eu encontrei meu herói ideal! Meu amigo Hinomori Ryuuga. O melhor amigo que fiz no ensino médio. Minha primeira impressão dele foi: “É como um personagem heroico de um anime”. E essa impressão rapidamente mudou. Por um lado, ele quase nunca fala sobre seu passado. Ele muitas vezes pula as aulas e quando ele volta, sua boca está sagrando, ou suas roupas estão rasgadas ou algo assim. Além disso, há sempre lindas garotas ao seu redor. A ídolo da escola Yukimiya Shiori, a linda espadachim, Aogasaki Satori, a misteriosa aluna transferida, Elmira Maccatney. Toda vez que elas aparecem ao redor de Ryuuga, eu me sinto extremamente cansado. Isso porque toda vez que elas se envolvem com ele, eu me vejo desesperadamente gritando coisas como: “H-Hey, Ryuuga! É porque eu, Kobayashi Ichiro, sou um amigo profissional. Desempenhar o papel do melhor amigo que apoia Hinomori Ryuuga, o herói dos heróis, é o meu estilo de vida. His sexuality is on full display.\nSince then, the anime sequel ``Stetsujin Jeeg'' (2007) has been produced, and it has appeared in the game ``Super Robot Wars'' series, showing that it remains popular even today, and has been exported overseas and received high praise. Masu. His pen name is ``Megum Matsumoto,'' and his drawing and composition skills are already eye-catching.\n\nWhile it develops dynamic robot action, it does not fit into the simple structure of \"justice\" and \"evil\", such as the human egoism that blames Sieg who is injured by enemy attacks and can no longer fight, and the protagonist who is at the mercy of this and suffers. This book is characterized by its deep theme and story that emphasizes human drama.\nIt has been 21 years since the first book was published, and as it is difficult to obtain, many people have been waiting for its reprint. 9f313df0-8582-4a9b-95cc-d86eac105068:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"9f313df0-8582-4a9b-95cc-d86eac105068","title":{"en":"Go Nagai's Samurai World"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"永井豪のサムライワールド"},{"en":"The Samurai World of Go Nagai"},{"ja":"豪談"},{"ja":"Goudan"},{"en":"Powerful tales"},{"ja-ro":"Godan"}],"description":{"en":"This is Nagai Go's period drama world, a total of 10 volumes of Science Fiction stories inspired mainly from the Tatsukawa Book Collection. Psychic wars unfold in the world of the Warring States period as the heroes of stories make full use of sorcery, ninjutsu, and supernatural powers!\n\nThe title: Gōdan is a twist on the word Kōdan. Wiki [Kōdan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/K%C5%8Ddan) is a style of traditional oral Japanese storytelling. But in the title, Kō is replaced by Gō in Gō Nagai's name.\n\nBooks:\n1. 児雷也 Jiraiya\n2. 霧隠才蔵 Kirigakure Saizō\n3. 猿飛佐助 Sarutobi Sasuke\n4. 後藤又兵衛 Gotō Matabei\n5. 真田軍記 Sanada War Chronicles\n6. 荒木又右衛門 Araki Mataemon\n7. 岩見重太郎 Iwami Jūtarō\n8. 雷電為右衛門 Raiden Tameemon\n9. 左甚五郎 Hidari Jingorō\n10. 武蔵坊弁慶 Musashibō Benkei"},"links":{"ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/104499/A000009505/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"489dd859-9b61-4c37-af75-5b18e88daafc","name":{"en":"Ninja"}},{"id":"69964a64-2f90-4d33-beeb-f3ed2875eb4c","name":{"en":"Sports"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"81183756-1453-4c81-aa9e-f6e1b63be016","name":{"en":"Samurai"}},{"id":"97893a4c-12af-4dac-b6be-0dffb353568e","name":{"en":"Sexual Violence"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e64f6742-c834-471d-8d72-dd51fc02b835","name":{"en":"Aliens"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}}]}

9f5cebe0-25c3-4f5f-a470-1aeb0266f74c:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"9f5cebe0-25c3-4f5f-a470-1aeb0266f74c","title":{"en":"Tiananmen Square"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Gate of Heaven"},{"en":"Heaven's Gate"},{"en":"Knocking on heaven's door"},{"en":"天國之門"}],"description":{"en":"The world's first comic masterpiece to fully illustrate the Tiananmen Square Incident! The intensity is comparable to that of \"The Silent Fleet\"! If you love military, history and care about the future, you can't miss it! In June 1989, Morrell, an American journalist, was in Tiananmen Square looking for subjects and mingling with the students in order to cover this once-in-a-lifetime student event in Chinese history. However, on June 4, the square, which was full of forward-looking energy, turned into a bloody and brutal killing field ……! Professors who were baptized by the Cultural Revolution, brothers who were guards at the square and protesting students, top Chinese officials such as Zhao Ziyang, Deng Xiaoping, Yao Yilin and Li Peng, as well as the U.S. government, Taiwan and the world, use a mixture of fiction and reality, together with rigorous historical evidence, to portray the premature arrival of the democratic wave in China from the perspective of all walks of life, the coldest summer of 1989. It has been 17 years since the Tiananmen Square Incident, which has had a huge impact on democratic thinking in modern China and which cannot be ignored in the analysis of the Chinese economy, took place in 1989. Although many written records have been published, no pictorial works have ever been created with this event as the main axis. Since the creators in Hong Kong, China, are unable to create such a theme due to political factors, and the creators in the United States and Japan are not clear about the circumstances, we are the only ones left in the world who can challenge the theme of \"Tiananmen Incident\". Therefore, we tried to reinterpret the \"Tiananmen Incident\", an event that brought a great impact to China and the world, by using the most easily understood and impressive comic book technique. The book is divided into four chapters, each presenting a comprehensive and objective analysis of the Tiananmen Incident in four directions: general, student, senior government, and world. The detailed and rigorous historical and military examinations, as well as the complete timeline of the June Fourth Incident in the appendix at the end of the book, make this book highly valuable as a source of information. It is a must-read for understanding modern China. (MTL'd description)  \n  \nRetail: [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/books/details/?id=VSiWDwAAQBAJ\u0026hl=en_US)"},"links":{"raw":"https://www.books.com.tw/products/E050044345?sloc=main"},"originalLanguage":"zh-hk","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"df33b754-73a3-4c54-80e6-1a74a8058539","name":{"en":"Police"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

His invincible strength and kind-hearted personality soon gained him a reputation in the town, and there is no end to the number of new students at his dojo. Kurama, gather together under the guidance of Mr. Mouretsu, and the dojo becomes lively every day. However, the disciples of the black belt dojo who were jealous of Mouretsu Sensei attacked Mouretsu Dojo. Although Oni Hime and Kuro Oni's efforts drive them away, it becomes clear that Ao Oni, a powerful member of the Kodokan, is manipulating the Black Belt Dojo in the shadows. What is Ao Oni's goal? And what is the real reason why Mouretsu Sensei opened the dojo?\n\n[Commentary: Haruyuki Nakano] (Excerpts)\nThe main character, Aka Oni Kokomo Retsu Sensei, is an adult, his love with Onihime,\na female judoka, and the fact that the two get married and go on a honeymoon in the second part. , a somewhat unusual development for a boys' manga from the 1960s. The main characters of boys' manga were boys, and it was common for them not to fall in love. I think Osamu Tezuka is the only person who has written about love.\nWhat's more, Akaoni's Uretsu-style judo is not superman-like. It was explained throughout that Judo is a theoretical form of judo that utilizes the opponent's strength to perform techniques, and the strength was something even children could understand.\nThe name Kodokan is reminiscent of the actual Kodokan, and the Gofune 10th dan, which is thought to be modeled after Kyuzo Mifune, a master who, while a small soldier, developed the technique \"air throw'' and achieved the highest rank of 10th dan at the Kodokan. It's good. The dark side of the adult world is also depicted, such as gambling matches with foreign boxers and conflicts with organized crime groups. Ao Oni's despicableness is not that rare in adult society. In the second part, there is also a judo boy who believes that his father, who died of cancer, was thrown to death by a red demon and aspires to take revenge. He might be the run of a beautiful boy with\na shadow.\nMany people seem to think that \"Hiroo Terada's manga is a fun and healthy manga for children,'' but in terms of \"Mouretsu Sensei,'' it realistically depicts the workings of the world, and I loved it when I borrowed it from a bookstore. Maybe it's because I read it,\nbut I can feel the influence of gekiga.\nIn the world of book rentals, \"Kage'' was first published by Hinomaru Bunko in 1956 and became very popular. Although the name \"gekiga'' is not yet used, new manga expressions that are different from previous children's manga and depict the dark side of reality and romance, with a young man as the main character, are being explored and attracting attention. It had become. Hiroo Terada must have learned about the new trend in rental manga through his manga artist friend Teruo Tanashita, and must have paid attention to it. While incorporating dramatic techniques, I feel that Terada's true character can be seen in the way he is advocating good and punishing evil for the sake of the children, and we can also get a glimpse of his dilemma."},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"69964a64-2f90-4d33-beeb-f3ed2875eb4c","name":{"en":"Sports"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}}]}

Что уже сделал, то уже не вернуть. Ведь время непрерывно идёт вперед, и вернуть его назад - невозможно. Но что, если бы можно было путешествовать во времени?\n\nХан Чжон Юн, обычный бедный студент, который любыми способами пытается вырваться из этой бедности и зажить нормальной жизнью. Но в один день, его отца сбивает машина, он находится в реанимации в больнице, и его шансы выжить - очень низкие. \n\nХан Чжон Юн очень переживает за своего отца, и на время пока он находится в больнице, он отправляется к нему в квартиру. И там он натыкается на странную рулетку, которая переносит его в другую эпоху. \n\nГ-где... Я?... Что это за место???.... Это сон?!... Вокруг поле боя, море трупов и крови... Это сон?!... Нет, это реальность, благодаря данной рулетке, ты сможешь путешествовать во времени, и становиться сильнее!\n\n---\n\n- [Original Webtoon \u003cWebtoon kakao\u003e](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%83%80%EC%9E%84%EB%A3%B0%EB%A0%9B/2525)"},"links":{"engtl":"https://www.webtoons.com/en/fantasy/time-roulette/list?title_no=4313","mal":"148026","mu":"8y7glnp","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57179774"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"292e862b-2d17-4062-90a2-0356caa4ae27","name":{"en":"Time Travel"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

a00e7b82-43b6-47fa-841e-d2329d4d3519:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"a00e7b82-43b6-47fa-841e-d2329d4d3519","title":{"en":"Backnumber 0"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Sebangou Zero"},{"en":"Backnumber Zero"},{"ja-ro":"Sebangou 0"},{"ja":"背番号０"}],"lastChapter":"52","relatedIdds":["5361651e-ee0e-454b-908f-625bf43504da"],"description":{"en":"Manga is for children!\nA masterpiece that 100% reflects Tera's view of manga, the first complete edition!\n*Recorded at the end of the book*\nInterview with Jun Kajii, author of \"The Age of Tokiwaso: Hiroo Terada's Manga Path\"\n\n[Synopsis]\nZero-kun, a member of the Shiinoki Town youth baseball team \"Z Team,'' was the strikeout king who was always an alternate, but through his dedicated efforts he won the position of regular center fielder and number one batter. Zero-kun suddenly became a popular player, but he joins the team not only in baseball but also in various incidents and problems that occur in the town, along with his kind-hearted younger sister Kimiko-chan who cares for his brother, and the reliable captain Oyama-kun, who adores Zero-kun. Gon-chan will do his best to fight with his good advisors, Nonki-sensei and others!\n\n[Commentary]\nHiroo Terada was loved by the nickname \"Terra-san\" at Tokiwaso, a sacred place for manga artists. The first masterpieces that come to mind are \"Sportsman Kintaro'' and this work \"Uniform Number 0''. Both are masterpieces that put the readers (children) first. In contrast to \"Supokin,'' which has a glamorous setting in which characters from fairy tales play great roles in professional baseball, \"Uniform Number 0'' features a baseball boy, \"Zero-kun,'' who can be found anywhere, as the main character, and tells the story of his family, friends, and family. This is a daily life manga depicting everyday life at school and in the town. Tera probably thought that there was something that could be conveyed because the protagonist was a familiar character who sometimes made mistakes and failed. The freshness of sportsmanship and the importance of friendship conveyed by Zero-kun and his friends became popular, and the series was serialized in Houbunsha's \"Baseball Shonen'' for five years. After the magazine discontinued publication, the serialization continued with changes in magazines such as \"Shonen Sunday'' → \"School Magazine'' → \"Boys Life.'' This book is the first complete edition that includes all the serializations of \"Baseball Boy'', which can be said to be\nthe origin of the work. Please enjoy this masterpiece that 100% reflects Tera's view\nof manga. You should be able to remember how you felt when you were a baseball player."},"links":{"mu":"ac5i5fg"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"69964a64-2f90-4d33-beeb-f3ed2875eb4c","name":{"en":"Sports"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}}]}

Woo-seok, now a powerful warlord in a moody highschooler’s body, swiftly and easily overpowers the bullies… In his head, however, the bewildered Woo-seok has just one question: Where the hell am I?! When her mentor discovers the tomb of a young pharaoh, a curse is put on the excavation team and Carol. The curse sends her back in time to ancient Egypt, where she becomes embroiled in the affairs of Egypt and other ancient countries such as Assyria and Babylonia. Carol meets Memphis, a handsome young pharaoh whose tomb she excavated in modern times. Despite his headstrong, at first violent nature, they fall deeply in love. This angers Memphis's half-sister, the Priestess Isis, who has longed to marry him. Carol, due to her exotic looks and curious ability to tell the future, becomes a major player in ancient history.  \n\n---  \n- **Won the 36th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shojo in 1991**","vi":"\"Tương truyền, khi chòm sao Sopdet xuất hiện ở Ai Cập ta, một thiếu nữ hoàng kim tỏa hào quang rực rỡ sẽ hiện thân bên bờ sông Nile...
